trans-unit.source: You can configure the number of CPU cores and storage size that will apply to the coordinator node. Adjust the number of CPU cores and memory settings for your server group. To reset the requests and/or limits, pass in empty value.

連線至控制器時發生錯誤。{0}

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL provides the ability to extend the functionality of your database by using extensions.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL 可讓您使用延伸模組擴充資料庫的功能。

trans-unit.source: Value should be either of the following: ({0}).
Some extensions must be loaded into PostgreSQL at startup time before they can be used. To edit, type in comma separated list of valid extensions: ({0}).
trans-unit.target: 某些延伸模組必須先載入至 PostgreSQL 才能使用。若要編輯，請輸入以逗號分隔的有效延伸模組清單: ({0})。

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL provides the ability to extend the functionality of your database by using extensions. Extensions allow for bundling multiple related SQL objects together in a single package that can be loaded or removed from your database with a single command. After being loaded in the database, extensions can function like built-in features.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL 可讓您使用延伸模組擴充資料庫的功能。延伸模組允許將多個相關的 SQL 物件捆綁到單一套件中，而您可使用單一命令在資料庫中載入或移除該套件。載入資料庫之後，延伸模組可以像內建功能一樣運作。

trans-unit.source: Some extensions must be loaded into PostgreSQL at startup time before they can be used. These preloaded extensions can be viewed and edited below.
trans-unit.target: 某些延伸模組在啟動時必須先載入至 PostgreSQL 才能使用。可在下方檢視及編輯這些預先載入的延伸模組。
深入了解 PostgreSQL 延伸模組。
預先載入之延伸模組的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Table of preloaded extensions are loading.
trans-unit.target: 正在載入預先載入之延伸模組的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Preloaded extensions can now be viewed.
trans-unit.target: 現在可以檢視預先載入的延伸模組。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to scale in and out your server group by reducing or increasing the number of worker nodes. The value must be 0 or greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: 您可以減少或增加背景工作節點數，以縮減或擴增您的伺服器群組。值必須是 0 或大於 1。

trans-unit.source: You can configure the number of CPU cores and storage size that will apply to all worker nodes. Adjust the number of CPU cores and memory settings for your server group. To reset the requests and/or limits, pass in empty value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定將套用至所有背景工作節點的 CPU 核心數和儲存體大小。調整您伺服器群組的 CPU 核心數和記憶體設定。若要重設要求和/或限制，請傳入空值。

trans-unit.source: Expand your server group and scale your database by adding worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: 新增背景工作節點，擴充您的伺服器群組並調整資料庫規模。

trans-unit.target: 啟用了 Azure Arc 的受控執行個體，不僅可以存取 SQL Server，還提供相容的功能，可以部署到您選擇的基礎結構上。{0}

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL managed instance - Azure Arc terms and conditions
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 受控執行個體 - Azure Arc 條款及條件
目標 Azure Arc 控制器

trans-unit.source: What is your target existing Kubernetes cluster environment?
trans-unit.target: 您的目標現有 Kubernetes 叢集環境是什麼?

trans-unit.source: Provide a namespace, name and storage class for your Azure Arc data controller. This name will be used to identify your Arc instance for remote management and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 請提供 Azure Arc 資料控制器的命名空間、名稱和儲存類別。此名稱將用於識別您的 Arc 執行個體，以進行遠端管理及監視。

trans-unit.source: Name must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', start/end with an alphanumeric character and be 253 characters or less in length.
trans-unit.target: 名稱必須包含小寫英數字元、'-' 或 '.'、以英數字元開頭/結尾，且長度不得超過 253 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Namespace must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-', start/end with an alphanumeric character, and be 63 characters or fewer in length.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間必須包含小寫英數字元或 '-'、以英數字元開頭/結尾，且長度不得超過 63 個字元。
建立 Azure Arc 資料控制器

trans-unit.source: Select the subscription to manage deployed resources and costs. Use resource groups like folders to organize and manage all your resources.
trans-unit.target: 請選取訂閱，以管理部署的資源與費用。您可以使用資源群組 (例如資料夾) 整理及管理您的所有資源。
從現有的 Kubernetes 叢集選取

trans-unit.source: By clicking 'Script to notebook', I (a) agree to the legal terms and privacy statement(s) associated with the Marketplace offering(s) listed above; (b) authorize Microsoft to bill my current payment method for the fees associated with the offering(s), with the same billing frequency as my Azure subscription; and (c) agree that Microsoft may share my contact, usage and transactional information with the provider(s) of the offering(s) for support, billing and other transactional activities. Microsoft does not provide rights for third-party offerings. For additional details see {0}.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [編寫指令碼到筆記本] 表示我 (a) 同意上述 Marketplace 供應項目的相關法律條款及隱私權聲明; (b) 授權 Microsoft 使用我目前的付款方式，收取供應項目的相關費用，帳單週期與我的 Azure 訂閱相同; 並 (c) 同意 Microsoft 可以將我的連絡資料、使用方式及交易資訊，提供給供應項目的提供者，供支援、帳單及其他交易活動之用。Microsoft 不提供第三方供應項目的權利。如需其他詳細資料，請參閱 {0}。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of CPU cores for the Postgres instance that can be used on the coordinator node. Fractional cores are supported.
trans-unit.target: 協調器節點可使用之 Postgres 執行個體的 CPU 核心數上限。支援分數的核心數。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of CPU cores that must be available on the coordinator node to schedule the service. Fractional cores are supported.
trans-unit.target: 協調器節點欲排程服務必須可使用之 CPU 核心數的最小值。支援分數的核心數。

trans-unit.source: The memory limit of the Postgres instance on the coordinator node in GB.
trans-unit.target: 協調器節點之 Postgres 執行個體的記憶體限制 (GB)。

trans-unit.source: The memory request of the Postgres instance on the coordinator node in GB.
trans-unit.target: 協調器節點之 Postgres 執行個體的記憶體要求 (GB)。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of the Postgres extensions that should be loaded on startup. Please refer to the postgres documentation for supported values.
trans-unit.target: 啟動時應該載入 Postgres 延伸模組的逗號分隔清單。請參閱 Postgres 文件以尋求支援的值。

trans-unit.source: Server group name must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-', start with a letter, end with an alphanumeric character, and be 11 characters or fewer in length.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器群組名稱必須包含小寫英數字元或 '-'、以字母開頭，以英數字元結尾，且長度不得超過 11 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for backups in GB.
trans-unit.target: 要用於備份之儲存磁碟區的大小 (GB)。

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for data in GB.
trans-unit.target: 要用於資料之儲存磁碟區的大小 (GB)。

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for logs in GB.
trans-unit.target: 要用於記錄之儲存磁碟區的大小 (GB)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of CPU cores for the Postgres instance that can be used per node. Fractional cores are supported.
trans-unit.target: 每個節點可使用之 Postgres 執行個體的 CPU 核心數上限。支援分數的核心數。
CPU 限制 (每個節點的核心)

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of CPU cores that must be available per node to schedule the service. Fractional cores are supported.
trans-unit.target: 每個節點欲排程服務必須可使用之 CPU 核心數的最小值。支援分數的核心數。
CPU 要求 (每個節點的核心)

trans-unit.source: The number of worker nodes to provision in a sharded cluster, or zero (the default) for single-node Postgres.
trans-unit.target: 要在分區的叢集中佈建的背景工作節點數，或針對單一節點 Postgres 則為零 (預設值)。

trans-unit.source: The memory limit of the Postgres instance per node in GB.
trans-unit.target: 每個節點之 Postgres 執行個體的記憶體限制 (GB)。
記憶體限制 (每個節點的 GB)

trans-unit.source: The memory request of the Postgres instance per node in GB.
trans-unit.target: 每個節點之 Postgres 執行個體的記憶體要求 (GB)。
記憶體要求 (每個節點的 GB)
背景工作節點計算設定

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for backup persistent volumes
trans-unit.target: 用於備份永久性磁碟區的儲存類別

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for data persistent volumes
trans-unit.target: 用於資料永久性磁碟區的儲存類別

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for logs persistent volumes
trans-unit.target: 用於記錄永久性磁碟區的儲存類別。

trans-unit.source: Provide Azure enabled PostgreSQL Hyperscale server group parameters
trans-unit.target: 提供支援 Azure 的 PostgreSQL 超大規模資料庫伺服器群組參數

trans-unit.source: Deploy an Azure Arc-enabled PostgreSQL Hyperscale server group (Preview)
trans-unit.target: 部署啟用 Azure Arc 的 PostgreSQL 超大規模資料庫伺服器群組 (預覽)

trans-unit.source: The cores limit of the managed instance as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 受控執行個體的核心數限制 (整數)。

trans-unit.source: The request for cores of the managed instance as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 受控執行個體的核心數要求，以整數表示。

trans-unit.source: Check the box to indicate this instance will be used for development or testing purposes only. This instance will not be billed.
trans-unit.target: 勾選此方塊以表示此執行個體將僅用於開發或測試用途。此執行個體將不會計費。

trans-unit.source: Enable additional replicas for high availabilty. The compute and storage configuration selected below will be applied to all replicas.
trans-unit.target: 為求高可用性啟用其他複本。下方選取的計算與儲存體組態將會套用至所有複本。

trans-unit.source: Instance name must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-', start with a letter, end with an alphanumeric character, and be 13 characters or fewer in length.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體名稱必須包含小寫英數字元或 '-'、以字母開頭，以英數字元結尾，且長度不得超過 13 個字元。

trans-unit.source: sa username is disabled, please choose another username
trans-unit.target: 已停用 sa 使用者名稱，請選擇其他使用者名稱

trans-unit.source: The limit of the capacity of the managed instance as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 受控執行個體的容量限制 (整數)。

trans-unit.source: The request for the capacity of the managed instance as an integer amount of memory in GBs.
trans-unit.target: 受控執行個體的容量要求，以記憶體整數 GB 為單位。

trans-unit.source: [PREVIEW] Business Critical (Unlimited vCores and RAM, advanced high availability)
trans-unit.target: [預覽] 商務關鍵性 (無限虛擬核心及 RAM，進階高可用性)

trans-unit.source: Select from the latest vCore service tiers available for SQL Managed Instance - Azure Arc including General Purpose and Business Critical. {0}
trans-unit.target: 從 Azure SQL 受控執行個體 - Azure Arc (包括一般用途和商務關鍵性) 可用的最新虛擬核心服務層級中選取。 {0}

trans-unit.source: General Purpose (Up to 24 vCores and 128 Gi of RAM, standard high availability)
trans-unit.target: 一般用途 (最高 24 個虛擬核心及 128 Gi RAM，標準高可用性)

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for backup persistent volumes. If no value is specified, the default storage class will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用用於備份永久性磁碟區的儲存類別。如果未指定任何值，則會使用預設儲存類別。

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for data (.mdf). If no value is specified, the default storage class will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用於資料 (.mdf) 的儲存類別。如果未指定任何值，則會使用預設儲存類別。

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for database logs (.ldf). If no value is specified, the default storage class will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用於資料庫記錄 (.ldf) 的儲存類別。如果未指定任何值，則會使用預設儲存類別。

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for all data and logs persistent volumes for all data controller pods that require them.
trans-unit.target: 用於所有資料以及記錄永久性磁碟區 (所有資料控制器 Pod 都需要) 的儲存類別。

trans-unit.source: The storage class to be used for logs (/var/log). If no value is specified, the default storage class will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用於記錄 (/var/log) 的儲存類別。如果未指定任何值，則會使用預設儲存類別。

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for backups in gibibytes.
trans-unit.target: 要用於備份之儲存磁碟區的大小 (GB)。
以 Gi 表示的磁碟區大小 (備份)

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for data in gibibytes.
trans-unit.target: 要用於資料之儲存磁碟區的大小 (GB)。
以 Gi 表示的磁碟區大小 (資料)

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for database logs in gibibytes.
trans-unit.target: 要用於資料庫記錄之儲存區的大小 (以 GI 為單位)。
以 Gi 表示的磁碟區大小 (資料庫記錄)

trans-unit.source: The size of the storage volume to be used for logs in gibibytes.
trans-unit.target: 要用於記錄之儲存磁碟區的大小 (GB)。
以 Gi 表示的磁碟區大小 (記錄)

trans-unit.target: 提供 Azure SQL 受控執行個體參數

trans-unit.target: 連線到現有的 Azure Arc 控制器

trans-unit.source: Cores limit must be greater than or equal to requested cores
trans-unit.target: 核心數限制必須大於或等於要求的核心數

trans-unit.source: Memory limit must be greater than or equal to requested memory
trans-unit.target: 記憶體限制必須大於或等於要求的記憶體

trans-unit.source: Requested cores must be less than or equal to cores limit
trans-unit.target: 要求的核心數必須小於或等於核心數限制

trans-unit.source: Requested memory must be less than or equal to memory limit
trans-unit.target: 要求的記憶體必須小於或等於記憶體限制

trans-unit.target: 適用於客戶自控環境中應用程式開發人員的受控 SQL 執行個體服務
